calendar.p: The Julian calendar, as used in England before 1752. The year starts on March 25.

A Hebrew calendar dating from the creation of the world, based on biblical genealogy. The start date varies according to the biblical texts used. Here, based on the dates given for the same events in other formats, this calendar starts in 3962 BC.
A calendar dating from the Roman discovery of Britain. Based on the dates given for the same events in other formats, this calendar starts in 50 BC.

Marchant Venterers
Barry nebuly Argent and Azure, a chief quarterly Gules and Or in the first and fourth quarters a lion passant guardant Or in the second and third two roses Gules. A pegagus Argent wings elevated and charged with two roses Gules God Be our friend
Marchant of Moscovie
Barry of six Argent and Azure over all a ship of three masts in full sail towards sinister proper all between three bezants, a chief Or on a pale between two roses Gules a lion passant guardant Gules. A pegagus Argent wings elevated and charged with two roses Gules
Marchante of the Staple
Barry nebuly of six Argent and Azure, on a chief Gules a lion passant guardant Or
Azure on a sea proper a ship of three masts in full sail Or the sails and rigging Argent on each a cross Gules, between in chief a sun in splendour Or and an estoile Argent, a chief Argent on a cross Gules lion passant guardant Or
